description:
Chris has the appearance of a man with long white hair. His hands are detached from his body and he can move them freely where ever he wants. Also the rest of his body is detached.
Chris was in love with Mei, who he was writing messages to. However he could not meet her since he is a Dream Demon. He would grasp any chance he could to meet Mei. Even thinking of using Yumeji as his vessel to meet Mei.
name: Chris Evergreen
